title: So-called House of the Doric Peristyle
description: A large private house in Cyrene.

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the so-called House of the Doric Peristyle in Cyrene, just South of the Caesareum and East of the Theatre 3.
properties.title: OSM location of the House of the Doric Peristyle in Cyrene
